description: New musical inspired by the real events of the 1936 Battle of Cable Street in London’s East End. Set in a vibrant, diverse community, it tells the story of ordinary people who come together to stand against rising fascism—celebrating solidarity, resistance, and the courage to protect one another in the face of hate.
tags: Historical, Political, Powerful, Community, Resistance, Social Justice, Emotional

description: A glamorous, witty musical comedy set among Philadelphia’s high society on the eve of a society wedding. Packed with sharp dialogue, romantic mix-ups, and Cole Porter’s sparkling jazz-age score, it follows socialite Tracy Lord as she navigates love, class, and second chances - proving that sophistication and sincerity don’t always go hand in hand.
tags: Classic Musical, Romantic Comedy, Jazz Age, Witty, Glamorous, Love Triangle, Cole Porter

description: A bold, campy, and wickedly funny musical that flips The Little Mermaid on its head. Told from Ursula’s perspective, it reimagines the classic fairy tale as a sharp parody full of pop anthems, dark humor, and queer flair, revealing that the so-called villain may have been misunderstood all along.
show_title: Unfortunate: The Untold Story of Ursula the Sea Witch
tags: Camp, Comedy, Parody, Queer, Villain Origin Story, Pop Music, Irreverent

description: Blending modern music with emotional storytelling, it explores identity, connection, and the choices we make in moments that can change everything - when secrets surface, boundaries blur, and nothing feels quite the same by morning.
